about_the_game:
Welcome to Two-Timin’ Towers – a tower defense game where your towers have friendly fire, turning a classic strategy game into high-intensity, bullet-hell mayhem. Control an engineer on the battlefield and build towers to defeat increasingly challenging waves of enemies, all while narrowly avoiding bullets from your own towers.

Part tower defense. Part bullet hell. All wrench-swingin’ mayhem.



Featuring…

  • A loadout of powerful towers that conquer the battlefield with a wide array of firepower.
  • A diverse cast of enemies with unique abilities that keep you on your toes.
  • Life-saving power-ups to help shift the tides of battle in your favour.

And many game modes to test your skills:

  • Endless Mode: Clash against a never-ending onslaught of enemies and climb the competitive leaderboard.
  • Map Maker: Flex your creative muscles by making your own maps and enemy waves. Or play through an ever-growing list of community maps.
  • Story Mode: Enter a vibrant world filled with distinct levels, witty dialogue, and lovable character art. In the current demo, this comes to life as a short tutorial.
detailed_description:
🏆 WINNER OF THE 2020 GMTK GAME JAM 🏆

"A tower defense game that fixes the most obvious problem with the genre."
- Mark Brown, Game Maker's Toolkit

"A bonkers, out of control, bullet hell nightmare."
- Mark Brown, Game Maker's Toolkit


About the Demo

Welcome to Two-Timin’ Towers – a tower defense game where your towers have friendly fire, turning a classic strategy game into high-intensity, bullet-hell mayhem. Control an engineer on the battlefield and build towers to defeat increasingly challenging waves of enemies, all while narrowly avoiding bullets from your own towers.

Part tower defense. Part bullet hell. All wrench-swingin’ mayhem.



Featuring…

  • A loadout of powerful towers that conquer the battlefield with a wide array of firepower.
  • A diverse cast of enemies with unique abilities that keep you on your toes.
  • Life-saving power-ups to help shift the tides of battle in your favour.

And many game modes to test your skills:

  • Endless Mode: Clash against a never-ending onslaught of enemies and climb the competitive leaderboard.
  • Map Maker: Flex your creative muscles by making your own maps and enemy waves. Or play through an ever-growing list of community maps.
  • Story Mode: Enter a vibrant world filled with distinct levels, witty dialogue, and lovable character art. In the current demo, this comes to life as a short tutorial.

name: Two-Timin' Towers Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Two-Timin’ Towers is a tower defense game where your towers have friendly fire. Turning a classic strategy game into an out-of-control bullet hell adventure. Navigate high-intensity battlefields as you build towers, dodge bullets, defeat enemies, loot currency, and most importantly… try to survive.
